column3: Needs to be added to contirb/linux-download-config and contrib/win32-download-config as well.\nI would also say requiring more than 3/7 sigs would be nice, so maybe increase minimum_weight to 150 (4/7).\n
If you increase minimum_weight, sure.  Anyway, this absolutely needs a Gavin ACK.\n
ACK, the more gitian signers the merrier (and I think we can reasonably trust luke-jr a bit by now :) )\n
Remade with my new 8192-bit PGP key (my old one was 1024-bit, which concerned some people); the old key has signed this new one.\n
At least now they have to manage to drug+coerce me. Which means a significant chance I shoot them first. :p\n
(I must admit, I have a 4096-bit RSA key...)\n
